Codemixed_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe kuch dino pehle total hip replacement surgery hui hai. Kal se mere torso, back, buttocks aur legs pe ek rash develop ho raha hai. Codemixed_Question: Mera namaste doctor, main ek 31 saal ka purush hoon. Mujhe kuch samasya aa rahi hai mere gardan mein (gale mein ganth) pichle kuch hafte se. X-ray chest aur USG whole abdomen saaf hai. Doctor ke paas gaya tha aur FNAC karwayi, jisme reactive lymphoid hyperplasia dikha par resolution nahi hui. Ant me, excision biopsy karne ki salah di gayi aur karwa bhi li. Report mein tubercular lymphadenitis dikha aur treatment shuru kiya hai aur abhi Akurit ke char tablets le raha hoon teen din se. Ab mera sawal hai, mere gardan ke do hisson mein kuch samasya thi jaise ki maine picture mein mere ungliyon se bataya hai. Upar wala bada aur sakht tha aur neeche wala chhota aur hil sakta tha. ENT oncosurgeon ne kaha ke wo upar wale hisse se lymph nodes nikalenge aur neeche wale hisse ka nahi kyunki wo same area mein aate hain. Iske anusar, excision kar di gayi aur upar wale hisse se char lymph nodes histopathology ke liye bheje gaye. Intezaar karte-karte mere neeche wala node thoda badh gaya aur mai abhi incision site ke just niche ganth jaisa mahsoos kar raha hoon. Do din baad, report aayi aur usme TB tha. Ab mera sawal hai, kya doctor sahi the jo upar ke lymph nodes nikale aur neeche wale area ka nahi? Kya ho sakta hai ke upar wale area ke lymph nodes TB ke wajah se suje aur neeche wale area ke suje hone ka koi aur karan ho sakta hai? Jaise ki lymphoma, waghera. Aapka expert sujhav zaruri hai. Kya lymph TB ek hi node ko prabhavit karti hai ya alag-alag nikatsth kshetron mein bhi sujan ho sakti hai. Image, neeche attach ki gayi hai.

Codemixed_Question: Mere finger joints aur leg finger joints par halka psoriasis hai aur haath par bhi halka hai pichle 12 saal se. Main corticosteroids preparations jaise flucort, clobetsol propionate, dipsalic aadi ko alag-alag formulations ke saath chakkar lagakar lagata hoon taaki koi formulation resistant na ho. Lekin jaise hi main isko lagana band karta hoon, kuch dinon mein psoriasis badh jaata hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ye sirf mental disturbances aur meri sensitive nature ki wajah se hai kyunki main construction industry mein kaam karta hoon. Kya moisturizers jaise Evion cream dryness mein madad karte hain aur kya Ranbaxy brand ki Xerina cream (Glycolic Acid+ Urea Cetylated Fatty Ester Complex) madad karti hai? Kya homeopathic treatment try karna chahiye kyunki maine 3 mahine tak homeopathic treatment shuru ki thi jisme acche result mile aur psoriasis ke flakes 3 mahine mein 75% tak clear ho gaye the, lekin mujhe SVT attack ke wajah se continue nahi kar paya. Kripya salah dein (Main Indian origin ka hoon aur vegetarian hoon).
summary: The patient has had mild psoriasis on finger joints and leg finger joints for 12 years, exacerbated by mental disturbances. Seeking advice on treatment options. The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Yeh meri 5 saal ki beti ke baare mein hai. Char din pehle usko sudden se fever aaya tha. Fever lagbhag 100 degree F tha. Kal uska fever kam ho gaya hai aur ab use nahi hai. Uske fever ke doosre din, usne thodi der ke liye behoshi mein aa gayi thi (thodi si thook munh se aayi) 5 se 10 seconds ke liye. Usne jaldi se theek ho gayi 1 ya 2 minute mein. Ye subah ke waqt hua jab vo uthi aur khadi hui. Pure raat bhar usko moderate se high fever tha.

Codemixed_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe scalp issues aur hair loss ke baare mein ek sawal hai. Main 17 saal ka hoon, kaafi dubla-patla hoon, aur mujhe celiac hai. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. lekin koi nau mahine pehele hi, mujhe baalon ka jhadna shuru ho gaya, uncontrollable dandruff hone lagi, aur meri skin pahle se bhi zyada dry ho gayi. Mere individual hairs patle ho gaye (khaaskar jadon ke taraf), zyada dry ho gaye, aur meri poore sir par ek chote se jagah ke alawa sab jagah se consistent roop se baal girne lage. Fir atyant khujli hui aur meri scalp ek unpleasant musty smell wala oil produce karne lagi. Haal hi mein, mere sideburns aur temples mein aur baal girne lage hain, lekin meri scalp par overall hairloss abhi bhi hoti hai (mujhe abhi tak receding hairline nahi hui hai). Iske alawa dandruff ke saath meri scalp pe kuch ajeeb se chote yellow substances hain, jo dandruff ki tarah lagte toh hain, lekin bilkul uski tarah nahi. Gire hue baal ke roots ke taraf chote, yellow, oily clumps lagte hain aur mujhe kuch polyester-like thin spirally baal bhi mile hain. Acne bhi bahut bad raha hai (jab bhi main sugar, fruits aur grains avoid kar raha tha), aur ye often meri scalp tak fail jata hai. Meri dad ki taraf hair loss koi specific occurrence nahi hai. Meri maa ke papa ke sir pe abhi bhi full head of hair hai. Meri family mein sirf do log hai jinhone hairloss experience kiya hai, woh hai mere maa ke do bhai. Mere shower ka pani iron-rich wellwater hai aur often bad smell aata hai, jo mere chehre ki skin ko burning sensation deti hai (jab hum salt filter bhi use karte hain). Mere thyroid issues hain, lekin mujhe lagta hai ki woh mere hairloss ka itna severe karan nahi hai. Kya koi jaanta hai ki meri symptoms ka karan kya ho sakta hai.

Codemixed_Question: Mere pati ne abhi kuch samay pehle gout ki shuruat ki (wo iss bimari se 2 saal se nahi pareshaan tha). Codemixed_Question: Namaste doctor, mera 8 mahine ka beta 2 mahine ke lagbhag se eczema se pareshan hai. Shayad ye allergies ki wajah se hai. Mere pramukh chinta ka karan ye hai ki past few months se uski digestion me samasya hai. Wo bahut aasani se kabz ho jata hai aur use aise cheezein khani padti hai jisse wo uncomfortable na ho. Usne is tak sirf breastfeeding ki hai, lekin haal hi mein usne khud hi chhod diya hai. Wo solids bahut khata hai aur diluted juice peeta hai. Mai use dairy products nahi deti kyunki usko formula se pehle hi kharab reaction hua tha. Jab use yogurt try karwaya to uske honthon me sujan aayi. Kripya doctor, is vartaman sthiti ko dekhein. Wo sirf 13 pounds ka hai 8 mahine me, jo bahut kam hai. Wo achhe se khata hai, lekin phir bhi itna chhota hai. Wo crawling ya scooting nahi karta hai; wo akela baith sakta hai aur sabkuch dekhta hai. Wo aam se jyada sota hai. Wo jyadatar samay mai hi pakda jana chahta hai. Wo aapki baat sunta hai aur aapko dhyan se dekhta hai; wo cheezein pakad sakta hai aur use ek haath se dusre haath me le sakta hai. Wo apne pacifier ko khud hi muh me dal sakta hai aur use cheezein purposefully giraana pasand karta hai. Wo jyada babble nahi karta aur meri ummeed ke mutabik jyada khel bhi nahi sakta.

Codemixed_Question: Namaste doctor, mai 42 saal ka mard hoon. Das mahine pehle, mujhe mera right eye mein acute posterior uveitis- Chorioretinitis with macular ka diagnosis hua tha. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe ek intraocular injection ke saath corticosteroid mila aur maine do hafte tak Clindamycin ka treatment kiya, lekin koi actual cause ka evidence nahi mila. Maine bahut saare blood tests karwaye par kuch bhi suspicious nahi tha. Macular ka resolution mujhe lagbhag teen mahine baad mila aur tab tak mujhe nerve ke aaspaas hi inflammation thi, lekin ek hafte pehle jab maine Triamcinolone ke saath periocular injection liya (mera pehla periocular injection), tab se meri uveitis bahut tezi se badhne lagi hai aur mujhe 99% yakeen hai ki injection ne acute re-inflammation ka kaaran kiya hai. Maine padha hai ki ocular toxoplasmosis ke liye Triamcinolone ke saath preocular injection karna bahut risky hai, lekin baad mein pata chala. Meri vision abhi bahut kamjor hai, mai apne right eye se padh nahi sakta jabki do din pehle kar sakta tha. Mai dar gaya hoon aur samajh nahi pa raha hoon ki kya karu. Mujhe pata hai ki acute situations mein intraocular injection of corticosteroid lagaya jata hai, lekin iss baar meri aankh ka reaction kaisa hoga, ye mujhe pata nahi. Kya hai koi tareeka jisse Triamcinolone ka asar ya samay ghata sakte hai? Kitne samay tak kaam karega Triamcinolone? Kya ye 3 se 4 hafte ya teen mahine tak active rahega?
summary: Is it possible to lower the effect or duration of Triamcinolone injection to treat acute re-inflammation in uveitis? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Codemixed_Question: Mera pati Iraq mein deployed hai. Iske baad usko sujniya huyi lymph node mili, jise antibiotics se theek nahi ho paya. Doctor ne ek needle biopsy kiya par uske parinaam se wo khush nahi the. Fir usko lymph node hatakar biopsy ke liye bheja gaya hai. Hum ab parinaam ki pratiksha kar rahe hain. Phir ye sab incidents se obvious assumption hai lymphoma. Mera sawal ye hai ki kya in ghatnaon ki jehrile ansh se hi lymph node suj gaya hai aur antibiotics ke istemal ke baad bhi uska dard aur sujan theek nahi ho rahi hai. Mujhe ummeed hai ki ye hi vajah ho lymph node ke problem ki aur dusri wajah na ho. Usne to doctor ko bataya tha par fir bhi lymph node hata diya gaya. Codemixed_Question:
The side of my face where your cheek meets your gum on my R. side has been swollen for about 36 hours. However, I have started experiencing some pain in front of my ear just below the temple, along my cheek bone to the side of my nose, where it ends. It is an "achy" to a subtle throbbing pain, which I have taken some Ibprofen's for, in doses of 3 @ 200mg per pill. I have concern, because of the swelling, but also when i initially felt a weird sensation, & it was shortly after that that it started to swell. Once it started to swell, it did so at such a rapid rate, that I was heading into the ER, as I called my mother (a retired RN) for her opinion. She instructed me to try a hot wash clothe, wait for 30 mins. then to apply a cold/ice pack, along with taking Ibprofen's to see what effect that would have on it. After doing that I felt that the swelling had stopped and possibly started to go down, as that area didnt feel as tight. However, i was woken up with discomfort early this AM, with the pain I described earlier, along with feeling as though the swelling had increased, to my R. side of my upper lip, and lip itself. I dont have insurance and would like to know if it would be better to get into a dentist, physician, or ER. Thank you for your time and advice.

 Mere chehre ka woh hissa jahan aapki gaal aapki masudon se mile hain, wo 36 ghante se sujha hua hai. Lekin, mere kaan ke saamne ke hisse mein thoda dard hone laga hai, sath hi meri gaal ki haddi se mere naak ke side tak jaha wo khatam hoti hai, waha dard hai. Ye "achy" ya halka throb wale dard hai, jiske liye maine kuch Ibprofen li hai, 3 pills @ 200mg har goli ki matra mein. Mujhe isliye chinta hai kyunki sujhan hone ke saath saath jab maine shuru mein ajeeb sa mehsoos kiya tha, tabhi wo sujha hua hai.Mujhe lagbhag atyadhik tezi se sujha hua hai, jiski wajah se main ER mein jaa raha tha, jab maine apni maa (ek retired RN) se uski raay li. Unhone mujhe salah di ki main ek garam wash cloth try karu, 30 minute ke liye wait karu, phir thandak wale pack ko lagau, sath hi Ibprofen lekar dekhu ki ispe kya asar hota hai. Uske baad karne ke baad mujhe aisa laga ki sujhan tham gayi hai aur shayad kam bhi ho gayi hai, kyunki wo jagah itni tight nahi lag rahi thi. Lekin mujhe aaj subah discomfort se jagaya gaya, jisme pehle wale dard ke saath saath mujhe laga ki sujhan badh gayi hai, meri upper lip aur lip ke khud bhi meri R. side mein. Codemixed_Question: Namaste doctor, maine lagbhag ek mahine pehle dono aankhon mein PRK eye surgery karvayi thi. Agar aapka jawaab no. 1. hai toh, phir antibiotics ki poore course ke baad bhi lymph nodes apne original size mein kyun nahi ja rahe hain. 3. Mere WBC aur lymph % itni fluctuation kyun kar rahe hai. 4. Kya CBC test se lymphoma ka pata chal sakta hai. 5. Aapki blood report ke baare mein aapki kya ray hai.

Codemixed_Question: Mere pyare doctor, mujhe mere swasthya samasyao ke bare mein kuch sawal puchne hain. 25 mahine tak bina suraksha ke hone ke baad, maine HIV test karwaya hai, jiska naam comb AIDS test hai, aur uska result HIV-1 aur HIV-2 dono ke liye negative aaya hai. Usi samay, maine HBsAg ka test bhi liya hai. Uska image neeche attach hai. HVC, scrub typhus, Widal test aur blood sugar ka test bhi liya hai, lekin sabhi ke result negative aaye hain. Teen mahine baad maine firse comb AIDS test karwaya, lekin is baar bhi result negative aaya. Khush nahi hua, isliye HIV ELISA test ke liye gaya, lekin is baar bhi result negative aaya. Lekin abhi mujhe kai samasyao ka samna karna pad raha hai, jaise ki atyadhik thakan, muh aur jibh mein chale, kamjori, peeth ke piche lal dhabbe, baar baar pyas, baar baar urine, urine ka tez gandh, kabhi kabhi khujli aur daag private parts mein, kabhi kabhi kaan mein dard, khujli aur lal aankhein, baat karne ki energy nahi hai, aasani se sardi ho jana aur band naak se chink aana. Haalhi mein mujhe malaria hua tha aur dawa lene ke baad main theek ho gaya. Kya yeh sambhav hai ki meri immune system 25 mahine ke unprotected sex ke baad antibody ko pehchanne ke liye bahut kamzor ho gayi thi? HIV AIDS hone ke liye kitna samay lagta hai? Kya yeh sambhav hai ki main HIV ke antim charan mein hoon jiski wajah se HIV tests ne false negative result diya hai? Kya koi aur HIV test hai jo meri HIV sthiti ke bare mein 100% result dega? Kuch log mujhe CD4 count aur PCR RNA ke liye jane ki salah dete hain. Kya mujhe woh test karwane ki zarurat hai? Mujhe jo samasyayein hai, unka sambhav karan kya hai? Ant mein, main aapse vinamrata se anurodh karta hoon ki mere sawalo ka dhyan se jawab de aur meri samasyao ko vyavasthit tarike se samjhe. Aapki meherbani hogi. Dhanyavad.

Codemixed_Question: Hi, Mein 25 saal ka hoon, 183cm lambai hai aur vajan 77 kg hai. Mujhe 1 saal aur aadha se jock itch hai jo mera ingle area me hai. Maine ise thik se treat nahi kiya tha. Haal mein, maine apne GP ko visit kiya. Woh kaafi jaldi mein the aur mujhe anti-fungal cream aur tablets recommend kiye. Maine treatment kiya hai 3 hafte se, lekin koi sudhar nahi hua, bas meri twacha me thoda redness hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kyunki prabhavit area ka rang thode se halka hai (aur un patches ke kinare thoda gehra hai) aur stable hai (bahut lambe samay se badh nahi raha hai), mujhe lagta hai ki infection pehle hi thik ho gaya tha, lekin lambe samay tak hone ke karan isne daag chhod diye hai. Kya ye ho sakta hai? Agar haan, to kya koi tarika hai in daago ko hatane ka? Treatment ke baare mein, maine Lamsil cream (Terbinafine 1% w/w) ko infection ke andar do baar istemaal kiya: ek baar lagbhag 6 mahine baad aur phir 9 mahine baad, har baar lagbhag 2 hafte ke liye. Us samay, twacha thodi si laal thi. Codemixed_Question: Hi doctor, mein 51 saal ka hoon aur nondiabetic hoon. Lagta hai ki pichle do hafto se main balanitis se suffer kar raha hoon. Maine internet par check kiya aur Clotrimazole ointment, FourDerm aur Terbicip ka istemaal kiya. Ye shama ho gaya, lekin har baar nahaane ke baad, ye phir se ho gaya. Mein apne private parts ke aas-pass saaf-suthra rakhta hoon aur usse namak wale garam paani se bhi dhota hoon. Lekin iska ilaaj nahi hua, bas control mein rehta hai. Do din pehle, maine ek dermatologist se consult kiya, aur unhone sabko band karne aur instead mein DK Gel lagane aur AF 150 orally le lene ko suggest kiya, ek tablet raat ko dinner ke baad, har teen din mein ek baar. Ye aur jyada lal aur foreskin ko poori tarah se laalima aur sujan se cover kar diya hai. Maine dermatologist se check kiya, lekin unhone kaha ki ye steroid FourDerm ointment ke istemaal se hai, aur ye 7 se 8 din mein thik ho jayega. Ye jal raha hai aur bahut hi sensitive hai, kapde se touch hone par bhi. Mein apni penis ki tasveer bhi attach kar raha hoon. Kripya madad karen.

Codemixed_Question:
Title: Kya mujhe kya ho raha hai?


Hi, main ek 30 saal ka swasth purush hoon. Halhi Mein jab main utha to mere dono aankhon ke uper sujan aur khujli mahsus hui. Jaldi hi mere bayen mathe par ek sujan aur khujli wala rash bhi develop ho gaya. Ye chale jaata hai aur phir se achanak badh jaata hai. Mujhe kisi tarah ka autoimmune arthritis hai aur main roz sulfasalazine leta hoon. Mere pitaji ko psoriasis hai isliye aap turant psoriasis ki baat karenge. Lekin main roz Valacyclovir leta hoon aur prescription ek hafte se bhi jyaada waqt pehle hi khatam ho gaya hai aur ye tab badh gaya hai. Mujhe kuch samay se gaal laal hai, baaki Valacyclovir lete hue bhi aur aakhiri 6-8 mahine mein meri bazo aur haatho mein tez khujli ke lamhe bhi rahe hain. Mujhe lagta tha ki ye sulfasalazine ki reaction ho sakta hai, lekin ab main yakeen nahi rakh paa raha hoon. Mere saath kya ho raha hai? Neeche uska chitr hai.

Codemixed_Question: Mere Pyaare Doctor,Samjho ke shaan se ho gayi hai meri biwi ki jeevan ki yatra kuch hi hafte mein. Hamari beti ko human parvovirus (5th disease) ho gaya tha aur vo bina kisi takleef ke gayab ho gaya- lekin phir meri biwi ko bhi yeh ho gaya- ek bade vyakti ke liye anokha hai. Usne mere skin mein kuch samasya develop ki. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko niche di gayi. Phirse uske pairo ki taraf badhti hui swelling aur sujhan ho gayi-- yeh sab adult parvovirus ke lakshan hain. Lekin, 10 din ke baad ya aisa ho gaya ki vo sudden vomiting karne lagi aur bahut hi jyaada ultiyaan hone lagi-- almost kuch kha bhi nahi paa rahi thi aur usse splitting headache ho gayi. ER se kuch gastrointestinal drugs lekar ke, yeh bhi fade ho gayi. Humne usse doctor ke paas le gaye- jinhone uska khoon pichhle hafte liya tha parvovirus ke silsile mein aur unhone paya ki uski white blood cells 2 (.) par crash ho gaye the, jabki 3.5 se 5.0 ke beechh rehne chahiye. Usko anemia bhi dikha. Naye blood tests uss haftemein kiye gaye aur uski white blood cells normal they- lekin usme mycoplasma pneumococcus positive aaya aur X-ray mein pneumonia dikhi. Blood test mein ALT bhi elevated hua tha. Abhi, usse pneumonia se recover hona shuru ho raha hai- aur vo khana bhi kha rahi hai- lekin uski left calf aur pairo mein sujhan abhi bhi hai. Kya yeh sab parvovirus se hi hua hai? Kya yeh sab mycoplasma pneumococcus se hi hua hai? Kuch hafte pehle vo bilkul theek thi- jab parvovirus nahi aaya tha- lekin usne bahut zyada kaam kiya aur apni shakti ko khatam kar diya hoga. Kuch dino baad uska doctor ka appointment hai- lekin mujhe darr lag raha hai aur main usse pehle jaane ke liye keh raha hoon. Kya aapka kya raay hai?Dhanyavaad
summary: Can the symptoms of skin rash, swollen legs, vomiting, headache, low white blood cell count, anemia, pneumonia, and elevated ALT be related to parvovirus and mycoplasma pneumococcus? The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Codemixed_Question:
Hindi: Namaste doctor, main 60 saal ka hoon, vajan 44 kg hai, height 5.6 hai, pichle 25 saal se diabetes hai, 80 din se low carbohydrate diet par hoon, ab diabetes ke liye koi dawa nahi le raha hoon. Sugar levels control me hai, har din check kar raha hoon. Pichle 50 din se problem hai ki raat ko pair aur pindliyo me sujan hoti hai, jo subah gayab ho jati hai aur raat ko wapas aati hai. Dard ya weight loss nahi hai. Kidney function test, liver function test, 2D echo, thyroid test, HbA1C, lipid profile, stool examination, B12 tests karaye gaye. Local doctor se mila, aur unhone bola ki yeh nutritional pedal ya malabsorption ho sakta hai. Neeche di gayi dawayein prescribe ki gayi hai. Oroalbumen powder 30 din tak teen baar. Revidox LB din mein do baar paanch din ke liye. Lasilactone 25 mg subah ek baar teen din tak. Upar se Thyronorm 25 mcg, Vitamin C, multivitamin tablet, Omega 3 fish oil, Ecosprin 75 bhi le raha hoon. Teen din ho gaye hai, kuch jyada improvement nahi dikha. Vitamin B12 ka level 1271 tha. Mere sawal hai ki Vitamin B12 kyun jyada hai. Kya yeh small intestine bacterial overgrowth ho sakti hai. Mere paas proteins aur healthy khana bahut hai, par koi fayda nahi ho raha. Kya aap madad kar sakte hai ki khana digest ho sake. Neeche uska image attach hai . 
English: Hello doctor, I am 60 years old, my weight is 44 kg, height is 5.6 feet, I have had diabetes for the past 25 years. I have been on a low carbohydrate diet for 80 days and I am not currently taking any medication for diabetes. My sugar levels are under control and I check them every day. The problem I have been facing for the past 50 days is swelling in my feet and ankles that disappears in the morning but comes back by night. I do not experience any pain or weight loss. I have undergone kidney function tests, liver function tests, 2D echo, thyroid tests, HbA1C, lipid profile, stool examination, and B12 tests. I consulted a local doctor who said it could be nutritional pedal or malabsorption. He prescribed the following medications: Oroalbumen powder three times a day for 30 days, Revidox LB twice a day for five days, and Lasilactone 25 mg once in the morning for three days. In addition to these, I am also taking Thyronorm 25 mcg, Vitamin C, multivitamin tablet, Omega 3 fish oil, and Ecosprin 75. It has been three days and I haven't seen much improvement. My Vitamin B12 levels were found to be high at 1271. I have a few questions: why is my Vitamin B12 level high? Could this be due to small intestine bacterial overgrowth? I am consuming a lot of protein and healthy food, but it doesn't seem to be helping. Could you please help me in getting the food absorbed? The image related to this is attached below.
summary: Why is the patient experiencing feet and ankle swelling, and why is their Vitamin B12 level high? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Codemixed_Question:
Mere Priy Sir,
Meri maa 62 saal ki hai, unhe diabetes aur High Blood Pressure hai. 20 din pehle (4th May) unhe achanak poore sharir par Skin Rashes aaye (laal rang ke) aur unka skin suj gaya, aur kuch ghanto mein unhe temperature 101 ka aaya. Usi din unke treating doctor ne unhe ek tablet di, uske kuch ghanto baad mere skin ke kuch masle kuch kam ho gaye. Unhone teen din tak antibiotic liya (ofloxin aur cefpodoxime). Uske baad se wo antibiotic band kar diye. 2-3 din baad unhe low grade fever mehsoos hua, uske baad unhe Blood test ki salah di gayi jisme Blood culture bhi tha. Blood culture me Steph Aureus mila aur uska kuch saare drugs jaise ki ofloxin (azithromycin, cephalexin, clarithromycin, erythromycin,tetracycline etc) ke prati sensitivity chhi thi, phir unhone phir se 5 din tak Ofloxin liya. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche di gayiye gayi conditions ke baare mein. Ab unhe subah 99 F tak ka fever hota hai, 1-2 ghante ke liye, jo khud hi antibiotics lena ke bina thik ho jaata hai. Ye tarah ki situation 8-10 din se chal rahi hai. Beech beech me kuch din aise bhi hue hai jab unhe fever nahi aaya. Ab doctor ne unhe ek urinary tract infection ke liye ek antibiotic diya hai. Pleaser suggest kijiye agar blood culture report sahi lagti hai aur further treatment kaunsa hona chahiye.
Dhanyavaad.

Codemixed_Question: Hi doctor,Main (female, 38 saal ki) ko panch mahine pehle corneal herpes ka first outbreak hua tha. Pehle GP ne ise galat tarike se Cortisone aur antibiotics se treat kiya tha. Eye doctor ne mujhe Acyclovir cream di aur baad mein Cortisone drops bhi add kiye scars ko prevent karne ke liye. Aek mahine ke baad, vacation par (bahut dhoop aur namak wala pani) wapas ho gaya. Pehle signs ko pehchan nahi payi aur sochi thi ki laalima sirf irritation ki wajah se hai.Kripya doctor, aankhein neeche dekhiye. Isne linger kiya, isliye ghar aane ke baad mujhe orally Acyclovir diya gaya. Do mahine pehle dye ko koi active ulcers nahi dikhe, isliye maine oral dose ko 400 mg tak kam kiya aur Cortisone drops fir se use kiye. Pichle hafte check up ke liye dye me do active ulcers dikhe.Isse main sachmuch hairan aur dara hui hoon. Mera doctor ne kaha ki ye stromal keratitis hai ya nahi, ye kaha nahi gaya. Kya iska pata lagane ka koi tarika hai. Hamesha se meri 100% vision thi kyun ki lesions pupil ke samne nahi the. Lekin mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki Acyclovir lene ke bawajood mujhe recurrence kyun hua. Kya Cortisone drops hani karak ho sakte hain. Mere doctor ne kaha ki dose ko phir se 800 mg karke Cortisone ko bandh kar do.Iska hal karne ka koi tarika hai kya abhi ke liye. Mujhe pata nahi hai ki mujhe do relapses hue hain ya phir ye pehle se heal hi nahi hua tha. Kya aisi frequent outbreaks ko koi tarika se prevent kiya ja sakta hai. Codemixed_Question: Hindi: Namaste doctor, mujhe char mahine pehle ek sex worker ke saath unprotected sex hua tha. Do mahine baad mujhe ARS ke lakshan hone shuru hue, thakawat, dast, chakkar, gala me dard aur munh me kuch samasya. Bas ek din pehle maine ek sex worker ke saath protected sex kiya tha lekin mera ling poori tarah se tan gaya nahi tha aur gehri andar nahi gaya tha. Isliye mujhe lagta hai ki vagina se sparsh ho sakta hai, lekin main yaad nahi karta, sure nahi hoon. Lekin usne mujhe ek unprotected blow job ya oral sex bhi diya tha. Do din baad, maine p24 antibody combo test karaya jo negative tha. Kuch din baad maine DNA PCR bhi karaya jo pehle exposure ke 11 hafte ke baad negative tha. Pehle exposure ke 12 hafte ke baad, maine CMIA rapid test kiya jo negative tha. Do din baad, maine HIV 1 aur 2 ke liye RNA PCR test kiya jo negative tha. Ye dusre exposure ke 30 din baad hua tha. Chhe hafte baad bhi mujhe thakan, jyada thuk aana aur gale me dard jaisa lakshan hai. Main bahut chintit hoon. Kripya bataye ki mere test final hai ya nahi. Mujhe late seroconversion ke baare mein padha hai aur mujhe chinta hai. Aur ek aur vyakti bhi hai jiska mujhe status nahi pata, usko bhi roz chakkar, dast, munh me samasya aur pair me dard jaisa hai. Kripya madad kare.

Codemixed_Question: Namaste doctor, maine multiple health problems ke detailed testing ke liye ek alag desh mein yatra ki. Mujhe gastrointestinal symptoms,idiopathic angio, thickened skin aur ajeeb blood vessels (chote red tree-like veins) ke karan scleroderma ke shuruaati stage ka diagnosis hua hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mere parivar mein scleroderma ke kaaran ki family history, high CRP aur high WBC hai. Skin test mein focal dermal sclerosis dikha. Kya aapko lagta hai ki ye diagnosis ko confirm karne ke liye kafi hai? Methotrexate aur Prednisone ko wo mujhe alternate days mein start kiya hai. Mere paas full Raynaud's symptoms nahi hai aur meri ANA test negative hoti hai. Lekin mere kuch intense symptoms hai jo is condition se match karte hain. Mere medical history mein severe asthma, allergies, angio, gout episodes aur anaphylaxis hain. Meri current medications hai Cetirizine 40 mg, Zantac 300 mg, Breo ellipta, Avamys, Singulair, Prednisone aur Methotrexate.
